name: Visual Studio SQL Server Project
summary: Learn about .SQLPROJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Older .DBPROJ files can be migrated to the newer SQLPROJ format in Visual Studio 2012.

description: Database development project created by Visual Studio, a Windows software development IDE; stores the schema of the database and can include SQL source code; used for creating databases for SQL Server, Microsoft's relational database management system (RDBMS) software.
